platinum.name: Workstate
platinum.description: Workstate is a global IT consulting company providing Nearshore and US-based development teams in long-term client partnerships. Our 25+ years of experience offers a superior alternative to staffing. Workstate’s is mission to create the best home for the brightest technology talent. Our teams drive success by working closely with our clients.

gold.name: Com Resource
gold.description: Having delivered strategic IT solutions for over 25 years, we are problem-solvers by nature. More than 200 of us…and growing. Customizing processes and technology are our specialties. The more complicated the IT challenge, the better.

silver.name: Revel IT
silver.description: Revel IT combines the most advanced recruiting and candidate identification and matching technologies with a very experienced recruiting team to provide unmatched delivery capabilities in staffing and recruiting.

bronze.name: Improving
bronze.description: Improving is a technology management and consulting services firm deeply rooted in our commitment to establishing trust — not only with each other but with our clients, partners, communities, and others. We aspire to do this through creating transparency, delivering results, continuously improving, clarifying expectations, and keeping our commitments.

bronze.name: OCLC
bronze.description: At OCLC, we exist because what is known must be shared. On the surface this seems simple. But dig deeper. We hold petabytes of data. Diverse data in different languages, different scripts, and different formats. We bring it together and make it talk.

bronze.name: Central Insurance
bronze.description: At Central we pride ourselves on our long history & strong financial stability, and a culture driven by excellence that encourages innovation, ingenuity and ownership.
